name: profiteer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who takes advantage of a situation in which other people are suffering to make a profit, often by selling goods that are difficult to get at a high price: a war profiteer

COMMERCE a person or organization that takes unfair advantage of a situation to make a large profit, often by selling goods that are difficult to get at a very high price: Humanitarian aid such as cans of oil were resold by war profiteers. profiteer verb [ I ]
Unscrupulous operators are scheming to profiteer at homeowners' expense.
